name: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course. Learn effective strategies and techniques to tackle complex problems in programming and real-world scenarios.

name: Database (MySQL)
description: Dive into the world of databases with a focus on MySQL. Master database design, SQL queries, and database management to become a proficient data professional.

name: AWS
description: Explore the cloud computing giant, Amazon Web Services (AWS). Discover its vast array of services and understand how to leverage them for scalable and flexible cloud solutions.

name: Software Engineering
description: Gain a comprehensive understanding of software engineering principles. Cover topics like software development methodologies, project management, and quality assurance.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Start your journey into the world of object-oriented programming (OOP) using Python. Learn about classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.

name: Basic Data Structures
description: Master the fundamental data structures essential for algorithmic problem-solving. Explore arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues in depth.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Prepare for competitive programming and algorithmic challenges using C++. Understand data structures and algorithmic techniques for solving complex problems.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Study the core algorithms used in computer science. Learn how to analyze and implement algorithms for various computational tasks.

name: Introduction to C Programming
description: Get started with the C programming language. Learn the basics of C syntax, control structures, and functions for building software applications.
